name: Lego Universe Newly Imagined Launcher
short_description:
Ladies and Gents,

today I want to present you:
The Lego Universe Newly Imagined LAUNCHER!
It is in version Alpha 0.1.1 right now. And only for Windows. Sorry Mac users. And it's a console. GUI will be added later.

Here is the list of PLANNED features:
-Play offline with one click
-Play online with two clicks
-Play online on your own server with one click
-Configure and run multible Servers without needing to touch any files again!
-Let the launcher download and install all of your files, so you don’t have to deal with that. And the launcher won’t do any mistakes leading to a non-playable client!
-Enjoy an auto-updated Game, Launcher and Servers, never check for updates again!
(-Use a Serverbrowser to quickly find a server to play on) – Not sure about that one

List of IMPLEMENTED features:
-Configure und run ONE server without touching any files again
-… mah.

Please take a look at the main project:
http://timtechsoftware.com/?page_id=1065
summary: Launcher for LUNI Server and Client
